title: Young Scholars Program offers a rich mathematics education (The University of Chicago)
text: ( Source : The University of Chicago ) In the summer of 1988 , 15 seventh-grade students from across Chicago convened at the University of Chicago campus, forming the inaugural class of the Young Scholars Program , an exploratory mathematics
